text: int main ( ) { int n , i , i2 , i3 , j , k , a = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int sum [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { sum [ i ] = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & j ) ; for ( i2 = 1 ; i2 <= j ; i2 ++ ) { for ( i3 = 1 ; i3 <= i2 ; i3 ++ ) { int s ; scanf ( "%d" , & k ) ; s = a + k ; if ( s >= sum [ i ] && i3 >= ( i2 - 1 ) ) { sum [ i ] = s ; a = sum [ i ] ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , sum [ i ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
